title: Growith
description: Growith is a freemium platform designed to help content creators improve their videos with actionable feedback. Upload your content and get insights from other creators and experts to refine your message, style, and quality. Creators get 3 free video tests per month and can earn more by providing helpful feedback. Paid plans are available for 20 or 40 videos per month, with top-up options for non-subscribers. Elevate your content with a supportive creator community.
